page.title: 07 Farms.
page.content: There are nine farms in our area. They are quite small farms and vary in size from 400-2,000 acres. One of the small farms Whitfield fm. is run by Nicky Walkers' dad.Nicky was at our school a few years ago. Most of the farms in the east of our area grow corn, wheat and barley and some keep sheep on the higher downland (e.g. Bradford Down). There are many barns built a fair distance from the main farmhouses to store hay and foodstuffs for feeding the cattle. Several new barns have been recently built at Giles Cross (Gascoyne New Barn). The farms at Bradford Peverell keep many cows as they are surrounded by the watermeadows, thus the milk is their main product.
